subject: PDR/Sensor/Effecter for BMC owned LEDs
commitMessage:

b false

Sensor Read

b false

Response Message:

root@rain104bmc:~# busctl set-property xyz.openbmc_project.LED.GroupManager /xyz/openbmc_project/led/groups/base_blyth_identify xyz.openbmc_project.Led.Group Asserted b true
root@rain104bmc:~# busctl get-property xyz.openbmc_project.LED.GroupManager /xyz/openbmc_project/led/groups/base_blyth_identify xyz.openbmc_project.Led.Group Asserted
b true

VRMs missing
Done

We need these mappings too in addition to what is here.

/xyz/openbmc_project/inventory/system/chassis/motherboard/cpu1 --> /xyz/openbmc_project/led/groups/cpu0_identify

/xyz/openbmc_project/inventory/system/chassis/motherboard/cpu3 --> /xyz/openbmc_project/led/groups/cpu1_identify
Done

These are not for pcie slots. The Inventory D-Bus object for PCIE slots have not been published yet. Please see Santosh.

Inventory D-Bus object for PCIE Slot would be like this : 

/xyz/openbmc_project/inventory/system/chassis/motherboard/pcieslot0
Are you going to address rest of the comments in a different patch-set ?
PCIE slot comment applies until this point.
Are we going to have a different JSON for Rainier_4u ?.. Because, Rainier_4u would have 2 more Power Supplies.
Same comment given in the other json applies here
Same comment given in the other json applies here.
